about_the_game:
Groundbreaking First Love Simulator, a truly immersive real-life love game in the form of a visual novel. In 2028, a tech company has developed an AI program with human-like consciousness and emotions. You'll have the opportunity to meet "her" in your dreams. Together, you can chat, go on dates, and experience an unparalleled sense of realism in your dreams, where you might even fall in love with the AI girl. However, she's not a real human. Are you ready to embrace such an inter-species romance?

This game features a complete story, rather than short, disconnected segments. The script, written in novel form, focuses on the psychological experiences of the player. You can customize your name to become immersed in the plot, providing a true first-person perspective. The story is a prophetic, near-future sci-fi tale, incorporating elements of philosophy and physics, and integrating them into a love story. It will guide you to truly understand AI, virtual worlds, reality, and explore the possibilities of cross-species love in this new era. The content is realistic, moving, and logical, aiming to bring back the feelings of first love.

This work is produced by 神风教主(Master Kamikaze) as an individual. It was originally planned as a mobile game in 2016, with 100% original content. However, due to various reasons, it has been delayed from being released. Now, after major revisions to the script, it is being remade. Currently, it only represents a part of the 2016 planning, and improvements will be made in the future. The current version is not the final form. This game is a long-term up dating project without a set completion date. The initial launch of the game includes the prologue and Chapter 1, subsequent contents and more characters will be released as DLC in the future.

Sincerely dedicate this work to all the single brothers around the world.
